name: Ortovox La Grave Hardshell Jacket Green (mens)
description:
Combing the pleasant merino with the Toray Dermizax EV high-performance membrane. Extreme weather outside - perfect climate within. The membrane is waterproof (26,000 mm H2O), breathable (20,000 g/m²/24 h) and allows incredible freedom of movement (200% stretch property).

The "La Grave" jacket includes all the features of an absolute high-end mountain jacket and yet weighs only 450 grams. Optimum body climate is provided by the discreet merino inserts and the easily permissive ventilation under the arms. In the front we use a two-way zipper, which proves to be extremely useful when wearing a hip belt. The two front pockets are tailored in such a way that they cannot be screened by the chest or hip belt of a backpack. The arms are preformed to get the best fit possible. Velcro cuffs provide a perfect finish to the wrist. A ski pass pocket on the left sleeve proves its worth any day on the slopes. The storm hood can be operated with one hand and is fully helmet-compatible. An integrated, malleable wire frame provides extra weather protection and forms a small shield.

Face: 100% nylon;
Mesh Inside: 52% Virgin wool (Merino), 48% polyester

name: Ortovox La Grave Hardshell Pants Red (mens)
description:
Combing the pleasant merino with the Toray Dermizax EV high-performance membrane. Extreme weather outside - perfect climate within. The membrane is waterproof (26,000 mm H2O), breathable (20,000 g/m²/24 h) and allows incredible freedom of movement (200% stretch property).

The "La Grave" pants is absolutely unique in the market and convinces by its many features at a weight of just 500 g. The suspender system is unbeatable. The suspenders are all located in the front area of the pants and thus allow a complete opening at the back of the pants without having to take off the outer clothing - the so-called "easy release system". On the sides we have used a continuous two-way zipper, making it easy to put on the pants. Ski boots or crampons do not have to be pulled out in order to dress. The knees are slightly preformed to create an ergonomic fit. We have integrated gaiters in the leg bottoms and also placed sharp edge protections on the insides. Last but not least, a waterproof pouch is integrated in the seat area to protect documents or electronic items from water.

Face: 100% nylon;
Mesh Inside: 52% Virgin wool (Merino), 48% polyester

name: Ortovox 3+ Avalanche Rescue Set
description: Includes: Avalanche Rescue Set 3plus + Beast shovel + 240 light pfa.probe You get better found The 3+ is a three-antenna device with a special extra function to first enhance your own safety. The intelligent position recognition system analyses the position of the antennas and automatically switches to the optimal transmitting antenna. There is no longer any such thing as the 'worst position'. You find faster The circular display lets you focus on the essentials. The distance to and the relative position of a victim. Always align the device to the arrow. The solid arrow and the central distance value keep you going in the right direction. You find more exactly The patented circular display shows you at a glance whether you are getting closer to the signal or moving away from it. With the precise distance value you can very effectively determine the distance to the buried victim and limit the area to be probed. You find more victims The 3+ allows you to maintain an overview even with multiple burials. The number of victims is shown in the display. As soon as you have found the first one you can blend out their signal with the pin key. The victim is displayed as pinned and you can immediately continue with your search. Safety features: Smart antenna technology enhances your own safety. Signal separation with pinning function. Very easy operation due to: clear control elements, precise real time display with directional arrows and circular display. Rubberized housing for protection and ergonomics. Display lighting for night searches, switchover in case of a follow-up avalanche, clear and optimized search acoustics, updateability. Beast Shovel Our Beast stands for maximum performance in any type of snow. The scoop vanishes into every touring backpack saving space and offers an optimal ratio between weight and maximum rigidity. The T-handle and sanded grip enable economic shoveling. The oval shovel shaft makes the Beast not only stiffer but also extremely resistant to breakage. 240 light probe Stable ultra-light sensor with the unique pfa quick-release tensioning system. With a handle, the probe can be absolutely safely stretched and just as quickly collapsed again and put together. The probe is tensioned with a Dyneema draw line. This is not only lightweight but also durable. For the 240 Carbon pfa, we use a tube diameter of 10 mm. The carbon probe is extremely rigid and therefore very accurate. The grip sleeve made of EVA foam allows comfortable handling during probing practices. The burial depth can be read from the markings on the segments. The 240 Carbon pfa is delivered with a handy quick-release cover.

name: Ortovox Merino 240 Long Sleeve Blue Mens
description:
Excellent wear comfort due to the soft terry cloth liner. The air warms up very well between the merino meshes and ensures a pleasant merino climate. 240 g/m² are ideal as a thermal layer on cold days or as the top layer at slightly warmer temperatures with no wind. The Long Sleeve has a round collar and a comfortable cut.

Material: 100% Virgin wool (Merino)

name: Ortovox Free Rider Women
description:
The ladies version of our bestseller. We have adjusted the carrying and hip belt to the female anatomy, as well as the length of the integrated protector. Who would buy a backpack and a protector separately, if both are available in one? A TÜV-certified one at that. The ladies version covers body sizes from 155 -180 cm. The protector is made up of five superimposed layers. With the neoprene hip belt, the backpack ideally hugs the body and therefore is perfect for fast sports. As free riders no longer restrict their activity only next to the pistes, but also climb a lot, we have provided fasteners for ski, snowboard and helmet, and loops for picks and other gear to the backpacks of the same name. Also included are safety, phone and camera compartments, the alarm whistle and accommodation for drinking system. Thus the Free Rider brings along the full Ortovox equipment - without compromise!

Nylon 95% minimum

name: Ortovox Free Rider 24l or 26l
description:
The premium product among the free riders! The Phantom not only looks great, but also features numerous highlights, which add yet more value compared to other free-ride models. The outer material is incredibly textile and has a fine look and feel. The Phantom is the only free rider that provides, besides the side ski fastening, a diagonal attachment that allows the skis to be attached without removing the backpack. The waterproof extra compartment is also unique and protects documents and electronic items from moisture.
Common to all free riders is the integrated SPS back protector. It consists of five superimposed layers that effectively protect against back injuries. The protector is TÜV-certified and is held by the neoprene hip belt where it belongs: on the back.
The Free Rider has a body-like silhouette. Due to the close-fitting cut, it goes through every movement without developing its own momentum.
As additional features it includes snowboard and helmet fasteners, a special compartment for safety equipment, pick loops, cell phone/camera compartment and the alarm whistle for emergency situations.

Nylon 95% minimum

name: Ortovox Freeride Gloves - Blue
description:
SWISSWOOL! The natural new wool from Switzerland is the ideal insulation fibre and is therefore the perfect material for Ortovox's new glove collection. Using specific heat zones, placed 120 g/m² insulating padding on the inside, while on the outside a snug 150 g/m². The wool fibres are packed in wind and water-repellent TORAY DERMIZAX EV. The membrane from Japan is distinguished above all by extreme breathability, stretch and robustness. The kidskin palms ensure a sensitive grip.

Material: Lining: 88 % Virgin wool (Merino) + 12 % Polylactide (Corn-based)
Outer: 100 % Polyamide (Toray Dermizax EV) + Kidskin,
Inside: 63 % Virgin wool (Merino) + 37 % Polyester

name: Ortovox Monialm Slipper - Orange
description:
The Monialm is our classic for cozy evenings by the fireplace in a hut or at home. The underside is provided with a soft leather trim to give the slippers the necessary ruggedness. They are characterized by very pleasant wear comfort and a distinctive appearance.

Material:
Upper: 100% virgin wool (Merino)
Sole: 100% leather;
Acrylic

name: Rental Package 1
description:
The Full Rental Package

Includes

- Jacket
- Trousers
- Goggles
- Gloves


We also will give you a pair of socks to get you going on the slopes. 

Once ordered we will contact you to see the best way to get the items to you, it will either be delivered to you in resort or sent via freepost with a returns package. We will ensure that it is easy for you.

name: Rental Package 2
description:
Jacket and Trousers

Once ordered we will contact you to see the best way to get the items to you, it will either be delivered to you in resort or sent via freepost with a returns package. We will ensure that it is easy for you.
